text: Captain Courtesy is a lost 1915 American silent drama movie directed by Phillips Smalley and Lois Weber. It stars Dustin Farnum, Courtenay Foote, Winifred Kingston, Herbert Standing, Jack Hoxie and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1915 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1840s
title: Captain Courtesy
